feed.title: GitHub Perl Daily Trending
feed.subtitle: Daily Trending of Perl in GitHub

entry.title: harmattan/reset-root-password
entry.summary:
Package that resets the root password in postinst (useful to recover a forgotten password)

                          reset-root-password
          Reset a forgotten root password on MeeGo Harmattan
          ==================================================

To use, copy "reset-root-password_1.0.0_all.deb" to the MyDocs partition:

scp reset-root-password_1.0.0_all.deb user@n9:MyDocs/

Alternatively, copy the file to the device using USB Mass Storage mode.

Then, open a shell as "user" and install the package via:

xdg-open /home/user/MyDocs/reset-root-password_1.0.0_all.deb

If you don't have access to the "user"'s shell for some reason, simply wait a bit after disconnecting USB Mass Storage, and the .deb package should appear in the "Search" utility when you search for it. Install it from there.

After installation, use "devel-su" to get root, and then use "passwd" to change the password. Use "dpkg --remove reset-root-password" to remove this package after your root password is reset.

Website: http://thp.io/2012/maemo/
2012-05-14 Thomas Perl <m@thp.io>

entry.title: W4118/f23-tester-hmwk1
entry.summary:
Don't touch tester.py.

Add your tests to homework_tests.py.

Copy your w4118_sh file to this directory.

Then run:

python tester.py

This testing script does not guarantee you will get a 100% on the homework 1. This script is intended to help you achieve a 100%.

To run checkpatch: cd checkpatch ./run_checkpatch.sh /path/to/your/homework/repo

Make sure there's no erros and warnings.
